content:
Hey there, I’m the founder of Self Taught Coder, where I share the specific knowledge I’ve learned while improving my skills as a software engineer without a formal CS background.
I’m a software engineer at Honey (acquired by PayPal) where I work on the core backend team responsible for the architecture and development of Honey’s data platform.
Feedback is always welcome.
Thanks!
